translation.en: So, what do you wish me to say?
We're gonna have new staff members watch this video on their first day.
translation.ja: NETFLIX プレゼンツ 新規職員は この動画を初日に見ます
NETFLIX プレゼンツ なるほど NETFLIX プレゼンツ
おのずと身に付いた知恵？

translation.en: How you came to be High Commissioner for Human Rights.
translation.ja: 人権高等弁務官になった 経緯を

translation.en: Oh, my God. But you realize I can't summarize 34 years in three minutes.
translation.ja: 34年分の仕事を ３分にまとめられない

translation.en: Maybe tell us where you served.

translation.ja: カンボジア ティモール ボスニア
レバノン ルワンダ

translation.en: You are asking me to recount my life.

translation.ja: セルジオ･ ヴィエイラ･デメロです

translation.en: My name is Sergio Vieira de Mello. I'm Brazilian,
translation.ja: セルジオ･ ヴィエイラ･デメロです ブラジル出身

translation.en: and I'm presently the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights.
translation.ja: 国連人権高等弁務官を 務めています

translation.en: This organization is the best opportunity you'll have in your life of achieving your dreams.
translation.ja: この機関で働くことは 君の夢を叶える絶好の機会だ

translation.en: the real challenges and the real rewards of serving the United Nations
translation.ja: 真のやりがいと報いは― 現場にあることを 忘れないでほしい

translation.en: are out there in the field.
translation.ja: 現場にあることを 忘れないでほしい

translation.en: Where people are suffering,  where people need you.
translation.ja: 君を必要とするのは 窮地に立つ人々だ
バグダッド 国連本部

translation.en: Stay against the wall.  Down the hall.
translation.ja: 壁を背に廊下を進むんだ

translation.en: So, Bush is going to want you in Iraq.
translation.ja: イラクに行かせる魂胆ね

translation.en: We are going to Rio, that's for sure.
you can say no to everybody.
translation.ja: 断ってしまえばいいのよ
コフィーもブッシュもみんな

translation.en: - - Do you want me to show you?
So I just met President Bush, and he explained the position of the United States,
translation.ja: ３ヵ月前 ブッシュ大統領は アメリカの姿勢を明確にし―

translation.en: and I reminded him of the position of the United Nations on this issue.
translation.ja: 〝イラク戦争 国連大使と大統領対談〞 私は国連の態度を 明らかにしました

translation.en: I don’t think anyone can predict what the human cost of a war will be,
translation.ja: 戦争による人的被害は 想像に及ばないほど…

translation.en: but it will be high... by definition.
translation.ja: 高くなるのは確かです

translation.en: Ladies and gentleman, welcome to Baghdad International.  Current temperature is 43 degrees Celsius. Clear skies.
translation.ja: バグダッドに到着 現在43°Ｃ 晴れ模様です

translation.en: Just wanted to wish you guys good luck.
My fellow citizens, at this hour,
translation.ja: 国民の皆さん 我が国は―

translation.en: American and coalition forces are in the early stages of military operations.
translation.ja: 多国籍軍と共に軍事行動の 初期段階にあります

translation.en: Cruise missiles, followed by the F- 117 stealth bombers.
translation.ja: Ｆ117ステルス爆撃機による 連続攻撃です

translation.en: The statue of Saddam Hussein down, and as it collapsed, a great roar - came out from the crowd. -
translation.ja: サダム･フセイン像を倒せと 歓声が沸き起こっています

translation.en: There it goes. It has fallen down to the ground.
translation.ja: 今 地面に崩れ落ちました

translation.en: The crowd is going mad, rushing towards it. They've been pelting it with stones.
translation.ja: 石を投げつけていた群衆が 像に向かって殺到です

translation.en: We thank all the citizens of Iraq who welcomed our troops.
translation.ja: 米軍を受け入れた イラク国民に感謝します

translation.en: The tyrant has fallen, and Iraq is free.
translation.ja: 独裁者は敗れ イラクは解放されました

translation.en: - Nice to meet you again. - Good to see you again. How are you?
translation.ja: はじめまして ようこそ

translation.en: Sergio, as the president made any commitments towards peace in Iraq?
A free Iraq will be ruled by laws, not by a dictator.
translation.ja: イラクは独裁者でなく 法が統治し―

translation.en: A free Iraq will be peaceful and not a friend to terrorists or a menace to its neighbors.
translation.ja: テロ組織を支持せず 平和で隣国を脅かしません

translation.en: Brazilian diplomat Sergio Vieira de Mello has been sent here
translation.ja: ブラジルのデメロ氏が 到着しました

translation.en: to find out what role the United Nations can play
translation.ja: 米国に支配されたイラクで― 国連が果たす役割を 見極めるためです

translation.en: in an Iraq run by the United States.
translation.ja: 国連が果たす役割を 見極めるためです

translation.en: The Secretary General's Special Envoy, with his long experience in trouble spots,
translation.ja: 事務総長が任命した特使は 紛争地のベテランで―

translation.en: is treading carefully in this difficult political landscape,
translation.ja: 複雑な政治状況に 気を配っています

translation.en: working with, rather than against, the US
while he tries to gain the trust of Iraqis.
translation.ja: イラクの信用を得る 必要があります

translation.en: We saw those riots where people were complaining
translation.ja: 電気を供給しない米国に―

translation.en: that the US wasn't delivering the power and the services that they have promised.
translation.ja: 不満を持つ人々が 暴動を起こしています

translation.en: Or if they believe that the United States is not going to make good on its promises to build true democracy in Iraq,
translation.ja: イラクに真の民主主義国家を 建てる気がないと思われたら

translation.en: this whole reconstruction effort could go up in smoke.
translation.ja: 復興支援の努力は水の泡です

translation.en: Other nations in history have fought in foreign lands... and remain to occupy and exploit.
translation.ja: 昔は異国の地で戦った国が 残って占領を続けました

translation.en: Americans, following a battle... want nothing more than to return home.
translation.ja: アメリカは終戦後 すぐに撤退する事を望みます

translation.en: Get back! Get back! Get back!
It doesn't look very welcoming. Does it?
translation.ja: あまり歓迎されてないようだ

translation.en: This is Baghdad, Sergio, not Saint- Tropez.
- Stay here. - What the hell are you doing?
translation.ja: 待ってろ 何をする気だ？

translation.en: - How are you? - Good to see you.
translation.ja: こんにちは はじめまして

translation.en: This is the plan. Looks like we're all on the third floor.
translation.ja: どうやら全員３階のようだ

translation.en: Carolina. - Yes? - Just up here on the right. You and your economics team.
translation.ja: カロリーナ 君の経済政策チームはこの右

translation.en: - What happened? - Ten minutes. Talk in ten minutes.

translation.ja: これを ありがとう

translation.en: you still think you can walk away after four months?

translation.ja: 何ごとだ？ ギャビー

translation.en: Sergio, what did you say to that guard?
translation.ja: セルジオ 守衛に何を言った？

translation.en: Liberator Base, this is Liberator Seven, over.
translation.ja: こちらリベレーターセブン

translation.en: Liberator Base, this is Liberator Seven. Do you copy? Over.
translation.ja: リベレーター基地 応答願う

translation.en: Tell my wife and daughter I love them.
translation.ja: 愛してると伝えてくれ

translation.en: I'm Army Master Sergeant Bill Von Zehle.
translation.ja: 陸軍曹長の ビル･ボンゼーリだ

translation.en: I'm going to get you out of here.
Ah. I need you to stay awake now.
- Stay with me, okay? - Yes. You remember what happened?
translation.ja: 何が起きたか覚えてるか？

translation.en: Do you know where you are?
You're at the Canal Hotel in Baghdad.
translation.ja: バグダッドの カナル･ホテルだ

translation.en: UN headquarters. There's been an explosion.
translation.ja: 国連本部で爆発があった

translation.en: Don't worry. We're going to get you out.
Don't let them pull the mission out.
translation.ja: 使節団を撤退させるな

translation.en: Jesus Christ.  You're Sergio de Mello.
translation.ja: もしやあなたは… セルジオ･デメロ

translation.en: - Are you ready? - Yes, Nadya. Please bring everyone in.
translation.ja: 準備は？ 全員ここへ

translation.en: On our drive in, I asked myself...
translation.ja: ここに来る途中で思った

translation.en: if I saw foreign troops on the streets of Rio de Janeiro, my hometown.
translation.ja: 故郷のリオに 外国の軍隊がいたら…

translation.en: And I would want it to come to an end very, very quickly.
translation.ja: きっと早く 去ってほしいと願う

translation.en: I see our role here as one that supports the Iraqi people
translation.ja: 我々の役目は イラクの人々を支持し―

translation.en: to replace the coalition as soon as possible and recover fully their sovereignty.
translation.ja: 統治権を彼らに返す 手伝いをすることだ

translation.en: And we cannot associate ourselves with that behavior that we all saw on the streets.
translation.ja: 今 外で見たふるまいと 同じ態度であってはならない

translation.en: God damn it. He got a sit- down with Ayatollah Sistani?
He's not supposed to take any initiative. The UN works for us.
translation.ja: 国連は我々のために 働いているはずだ

translation.en: Sistani won't meet anyone. I can't even get His Eminence to return my calls.
translation.ja: 私が連絡しても 返事さえよこさないのに

translation.en: How the hell did Sergio make that happen?
I don't know, sir. He just went and did it.
UN envoy Sergio de Mello conferred today
translation.ja: 本日 デメロ国連特使は―

translation.en: with Iraq's most powerful religious leader, Ayatollah Sistani,
translation.ja: イラクの最も有力な 宗教指導者シスタニ師と会談

translation.en: in what could be a political breakthrough leading to early elections
translation.ja: イラクの最も有力な 宗教指導者シスタニ師と会談 迅速な選挙と米軍撤退に つながると―

translation.en: and an end to the US occupation.
translation.ja: 期待の声が上がっています

translation.en: Since arriving in Iraq, de Mello has crisscrossed the nation,
translation.ja: 期待の声が上がっています デメロ氏はイラク中を訪れ―

translation.en: listening to ordinary citizens, many of whom are out of work
translation.ja: デメロ氏はイラク中を訪れ― 職を失い絶望した一般市民に 耳を傾けています

translation.en: - and increasingly desperate. - - Yes? - What I do?
translation.ja: 職を失い絶望した一般市民に 耳を傾けています

translation.en: Step back. What I do? Starve?
translation.ja: 飢え死にしろと言うのか？

translation.en: - No. You must not do that. No. - Step back.
- I'm a university graduate! - I understand.
With food shortages on the rise, frustration is at a boiling point.
translation.ja: 食料不足で 一触即発の状態です

translation.en: We need to reopen the bridges and get people back to work so they can get across town,
translation.ja: 橋を開いて 人々が止められることなく―

translation.en: get in their taxi, in their car, and... - go through gates without being detained. - All good?
translation.ja: 車やタクシーで移動して 仕事に行けるようにしなきゃ

translation.en: - King Abdullah is confirmed for Tuesday, - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: 火曜に アブドラ国王と会った後―

translation.en: then to Tehran for President Khatami.
translation.ja: テヘランでハタミ大統領

translation.en: - Okay. Thank you, Lynn. - You're welcome.
I'll need a list of passengers for the flight. ...they can attack us there.
translation.ja: 攻撃を懸念する声も 上がっています

translation.en: We've got the force necessary to deal with the security...
translation.ja: 応戦する武力はそろっている

translation.en: I can't believe these guys are going to reopen Abu Ghraib.
translation.ja: アブグレイブを開くだと？
ナディア 抑留者は何人？

translation.en: Thousands. They raid homes every night.
translation.ja: 何千人 毎晩 増えてる

translation.en: Jesus Christ.  This place is a powder keg.
translation.ja: ここは一触即発の状態だ

translation.en: They tell me the guards painted this graffiti themselves
translation.ja: いずれこうなると 捕虜にわからせるために―

translation.en: so the prisoners would know what was to come.
translation.ja: 看守達が描いたそうだ

translation.en: We came as liberators, my friend.
translation.ja: 我々はこの国を解放しに来た

translation.en: the Iraqi people deserve better than Saddam Hussein.
translation.ja: サダム･フセインは 指導者としてふさわしくない

translation.en: - On that we can all agree. - Absolutely.
translation.ja: サダム･フセインは 指導者としてふさわしくない そうだろ

translation.en: I must say... I'm surprised, Paul,
translation.ja: アブグレイブを 開くと聞いて…

translation.en: to hear that you are rebuilding Abu Ghraib.
translation.ja: あっけに取られている

translation.en: We're mopping up resistance, Sergio. We have to put people someplace.
translation.ja: 抵抗運動の排除に 人を収容する場所がいる

translation.en: the symbolism of, uh... Saddam's torture chambers...
translation.ja: 何もフセインの拷問部屋を…

translation.en: It's not the message you want to send, Paul.
translation.ja: 心証が悪いと思わないか？

translation.en: Let me worry about that, okay?
Sergio... the White House likes you,
translation.ja: 君はホワイトハウスに 好かれている

translation.en: but surprises make Washington very nervous.
Well, you're meeting with... Sistani for a start. That doesn't help.
translation.ja: 君がシスタニと 会ったりすると…

translation.en: It gives the impression I'm not in control.
translation.ja: 私に主導権が ないように見える

translation.en: My conversation with Sistani went really well.

translation.ja: イラク憲法に基づいて―

translation.en: if we hold elections under an Iraqi constitution.
translation.ja: 選挙を行えば 多国籍軍のためにもなる

translation.en: We have our own plan for elections.
translation.ja: 我々には我々の考えがある
状況を安定させてからだ

translation.en: The longer you stay here,  the worse it will get. Please trust me.
translation.ja: ここに長くいればいるほど 情勢は悪化する

translation.en: This isn't East Timor. You're not viceroy here, Sergio.
translation.ja: 東ティモールとは違う 君は総督ではない

translation.en: Did you agree on what role the UN will play here?
translation.ja: イラクでの国連の役目は？

translation.en: Uh, my good friend Sergio and I had a productive discussion covering a range of issues.
translation.ja: セルジオとは 有意義な話し合いができた

translation.en: We both agree on a peaceful and free Iraq.
translation.ja: お互いイラクの平和と 自由化を求めている

translation.en: The role of the UN is something we are working to define.
translation.ja: 国連の役割は これから定義づける

translation.en: - You too, Sergio. - That's it, folks. No more questions.
Will there be any reopening of the Abu Ghraib prison you can speak of?
translation.ja: アブグレイブが 再び開かれると言う噂(うわさ)は？

translation.en: Sergio! Mr. De Mello. Mr. De Mello. You were with Paul Bremer at Abu Ghraib.
translation.ja: デメロさん ブレマー氏と一緒でしたね

translation.en: Is the UN just a cover for the American occupation?
translation.ja: 国連は米国侵略の 隠れみのですか？

translation.en: First of all, my friend, I'm answering your question,
translation.ja: 君の質問に答えさせてもらう

translation.en: the UN, its Secretary- General, and Sergio Vierira de Mello, representing the Secretary- General,
translation.ja: 国連も 国連の事務総長も 事務総長を代表する私も―

translation.en: are no tool and no cover for anyone.
translation.ja: 誰の道具でもありません

translation.en: Secretary- General Kofi Annan and myself are independent. From anyone.
translation.ja: アナン事務総長と私は 誰からも独立してます

translation.en: So don't suggest for a second we are here supporting the United States or the coalition.
translation.ja: 米国や多国籍軍の裏方と 勘違いしないで欲しい

translation.en: Pull together everything we know about the occupation.
translation.ja: 占領の実態をまとめてくれ

translation.en: Roadblocks, detentions, torture, Abu Ghraib, everything.
translation.ja: 道路封鎖 拘留 構造 アブグレイブ すべてだ

translation.en: We will send a full dossier to the Security Council tomorrow morning.
translation.ja: 明朝 安全保障理事会に 報告書を送る

translation.en: Let's do this. No time to waste.
- Let's add an appendix... - Okay, I'll review it. ...to the economics section with all the data.
translation.ja: 経済データを 付属書として足すわ

translation.en: A little more coffee in your sugar?
translation.ja: 〈砂糖にコーヒーを 入れてるようだ〉

translation.en: This will be a long night.
We'll need a strong cover note for the dossier.
translation.ja: 〈報告書に説得力のある 送付状が必要だ〉

translation.en: We need to tell the world what's happening here.
translation.ja: 世界に事実を知らせなきゃ

translation.en: Wait.  Is this going public, or is it just for the Security Council?
translation.ja: これは公表されるのよね

translation.en: The Americans are going to go nuts with this.
- Sergio-- - No, let's not make it worse. No.
translation.ja: これ以上事態を 悪化させる事はない

translation.en: Can you move your leg, Sergio?
Can you move any parts of your body, other than the ones I've seen?
translation.ja: 見えてない部分は動くか？

translation.en: I just want to know. Don't--
- We're just talking here. - My arm...
translation.ja: 話でもしよう 腕が

translation.en: What can I do for you?
Sergio, that was, uh, quite a performance you had there.
translation.ja: 今のは大した演説だった

translation.en: No tool, no cover for anyone not here... supporting the occupation.
translation.ja: 誰の道具でもない… 占領を支持していない？

translation.en: I honestly believe this serves both our interests, Paul.
translation.ja: お互いの得になると思う

translation.en: If the Iraqis know the UN is independent,
translation.ja: 独立機関が管理すれば―

translation.en: then the elections we supervise will be seen as legitimate.
translation.ja: 公正な選挙だとみなされる

translation.en: And if the elections are legitimate, Paul, then...
then we can all go home.
I've decided there won't be any elections, not until we're ready.
translation.ja: 選挙は準備が整うまで 延期する
私も決めたことがある

translation.en: I also decided something I needed to share with you.
translation.ja: 私も決めたことがある 君にも伝えておく

translation.en: Tomorrow morning, we'll send the Security Council a full dossier concerning the occupation
translation.ja: 明朝 占領軍がいかに 人権を侵害しているか―

translation.en: and its many human rights violations, Paul.
translation.ja: 安全保障理事会に報告する

translation.en: You know what? Hang on, hang on. Pull over.
Pull over. Give me one second.
A dossier to the Security Council? You can't do that, Sergio.
translation.ja: 安全保障理事会に 報告するなど許さない

translation.en: With all due respect, Paul, you have no authority  to tell me what I can or cannot do.
translation.ja: あなたが私に指図する 権限はない

translation.en: The Security Council mandate is very clear.
translation.ja: 理事会からの指令は明らかだ

translation.en: You're here to support our effort to stabilize and rebuild Iraq.
translation.ja: 理事会からの指令は明らかだ イラクの安定と復興のために 我々を支持することだろ

translation.en: - That's the only reason you're here. - The only reason I'm here
translation.ja: イラクの安定と復興のために 我々を支持することだろ あなたは壊したものを 直せないでいる

translation.en: is because you broke it, and you have no idea
translation.ja: あなたは壊したものを 直せないでいる

translation.en: - how to put it back together again. - Sergio...

translation.ja: 野心があるのはいいが―
野心があるのはいいが― アメリカを責めても 事務総長にはなれないぞ

translation.en: isn't the best way to become the next Secretary- General, I can tell you that.
translation.ja: アメリカを責めても 事務総長にはなれないぞ

translation.en: Security- wise, there will be three.
There's going to be Gil and Sergio. We might stay overnight if something happens, okay?
translation.ja: ギルとセルジオは 泊りになるかもしれない

translation.en: Carolina, here's the economics section with all your final notes. Thanks.
translation.ja: あなたが手直しした 経済項目です

translation.en: Call a press conference for 9:00 a.m., before DC wakes up.
translation.ja: アメリカが起きる前の 午前９時に記者会見だ

translation.en: A press conference? We're going public?
The world has a right to know what's going on here.
translation.ja: 世界には知る権利がある

translation.en: Sergio... no more Oval Office visits for you.
translation.ja: 大統領執務室には もう呼ばれないぞ

translation.en: - What happened? - We're going to get you out.
translation.ja: 一体何が？ 必ず救出してみせる

translation.en: All right.  They're coming right now.

translation.ja: 何か喋(しゃべ)ってくれ

translation.en: Hey, Gil? Gil, are you okay?
Liberator Base, this is Liberator Seven.  I have two survivors
translation.ja: こちらリベレーターセブン 生存者が２人

translation.en: inside the building near the ground level, under the pancaked portion of the roof.
translation.ja: 屋根が潰れた部分の １階付近にいる

translation.en: I've got a daughter too. They're pretty special, huh?
translation.ja: 俺にも娘がいる 気持ちはわかる

translation.en: Liberator Base, I have survivors. I repeat, I have survivors.
translation.ja: リベレーター基地 生存者がいる 応答してくれ
生存者がいる 応答してくれ

translation.en: Liberator Base, this is Liberator Seven. Do you copy?
translation.ja: こちらリベレーターセブン 応答願う

translation.en: How is my team? How is everybody?
translation.ja: チームのみんなは無事か？

translation.en: How is Carolina? How is Carolina?
I'm sure when he notices I'm missing, he'll... he'll come running.
translation.ja: 逃げたのがバレたら 追いかけてくる

translation.en: Well, you're not allowed to go missing.
translation.ja: いなくなったら一大事よ

translation.en: Nothing quite like the sound of a Kalashnikov in the morning.
translation.ja: 朝のカラシニコフの音は たまらないね

translation.en: I guess our ceasefire has yet to take hold.
translation.ja: 停戦は定着してないようだな

translation.en: It's an LMG version. Six hundred rounds per minute.
I need to get back. Maybe you do too.
translation.ja: 戻らなきゃ　あなたもよ

translation.en: I can't protect you like that.
translation.ja: 守る身にもなってくれ

translation.en: At least you have to let me know where you are.
translation.ja: 行先くらい教えてほしい

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry. It came from there, I think. Right in the woods.
translation.ja: 悪かったよ 銃声は森の中からだと思う

translation.en: We'll take him to the collection point.

translation.ja: セルジオ セルジオ

translation.en: Hey, guys, set me up a perimeter all the way around.
Get these walking wounded out of here!
You guys post up here. Nobody gets through.
translation.ja: ここに立て　誰も通すな

translation.en: We have this breaking news to tell you about.
There has been a blast at UN Headquarters in Baghdad.
translation.ja: バグダッドの国連本部 カナル･ホテルで―

translation.en: It happened at the Canal Hotel.
An unknown number of wounded are there now,
and there are medical choppers apparently hovering above.
translation.ja: 救急用航空機が 上空を飛行中です

translation.en: A massive rescue effort underway to extract dozens of people
translation.ja: 建物に閉じ込められた 人々を救出するべく―

translation.en: possibly still trapped inside the UN Headquarters.
translation.ja: 大がかりな作業が 行われています

translation.en: One side of that building looks like it's suffered considerable damage,
translation.ja: 建物の一部は被害が著しく―

translation.en: completely collapsing on one wall there.
translation.ja: 壁が完全に崩壊しています

translation.en: Some people reporting windows shattered as far as a kilometer away.
translation.ja: １キロ離れた建物の 窓が割れたそうです

translation.en: Hold on. They'll get us out soon.

translation.ja: 東ティモール　国連本部

translation.en: I don't believe in being fashionably late either.
translation.ja: 僕も時間通りに 来てしまうタイプだ

translation.en: No. For a diplomatic meeting, never.
translation.ja: 外交上の会見では当然よ

translation.en: So there are some occasions that call for being late?
translation.ja: 遅れてもいい場合が あるのかい？

translation.en: My mother taught me always keep them waiting and leave them wanting more.
translation.ja: 必ず待たせて焦(じ)らすようにと 母に教わった

translation.en: Quit Wall Street to come out here and change the world.
translation.ja: 〈ウォール街を辞め 世界を変えに来た〉

translation.en: Economic advisor to our transitional government.
translation.ja: 〈アルゼンチン出身 暫定政府の経済顧問〉
予習したのね 当然さ

translation.en: That's something my mother taught me.
what do you think of our prospects?
I think if you do your job, I will do mine.
translation.ja: 精一杯がんばりましょ

translation.en: - Sergio, he's here. - That's not what I meant.
translation.ja: おでましだ 意味が違う

translation.en: It's an honor and a privilege to serve East Timor.
translation.ja: 〈東ティモールに仕えるのを 光栄に思っている〉

translation.en: Mr. de Mello, I've heard a lot about you.
The world's Mr. Fix- It they call you, right?
translation.ja: あだ名は “世界の修理屋”だと

translation.en: Over time, we've developed certain modalities for conflict resolution.
translation.ja: 〈紛争解決の手順を 開発してきたまでだ〉

translation.en: What modalities do you envision for us, Mr. de Mello?
translation.ja: 我々にはどういう手順を 考えている？

translation.en: Well, a total ceasefire for a start.
translation.ja: まずは完全な停戦から

translation.en: You know, I recently met with the prime minister of Cambodia,
translation.ja: つい最近カンボジアの 首相に会ったが―

translation.en: and he told me to beware of you guys.
translation.ja: 気をつけろと言われた

translation.en: He told me that the UN ran around his country for two years  and left nothing behind.
translation.ja: 国連は２年間 国を振り回し 結局何もしなかったと

translation.en: There is a different side to that story.
translation.ja: それは一方的な見方だ

translation.en: And if you'll allow me to introduce you to our... transitional government.
translation.ja: 暫定政府のメンバーを 紹介させてほしい

translation.en: This is, uh, Gil Loescher, - our Deputy Administrator. - Gusmao, nice to meet you.
translation.ja: 彼は副総督の ギル･ロッシャー

translation.en: - Nice to meet you. - Daniel Travers, Finance Minister.
translation.ja: どうも 財務大臣のトラバーズ氏 保健大臣のアブジア博士

translation.en: Doctor Faith Abujia, Minister of Health.
translation.ja: 財務大臣のトラバーズ氏 保健大臣のアブジア博士

translation.en: You have quick fixes for complex issues, don't you?
translation.ja: 〈複雑な問題を すぐ直せると？〉

translation.en: Indonesia wants to wipe my country off the map.
translation.ja: 〈インドネシアは 私の国を抹消したい〉

translation.en: We don't have time for UN modalities
translation.ja: 〈国連平和維持軍は ボスニアやルワンダで―〉

translation.en: that led to the death of millions in Bosnia and Rwanda
translation.ja: 〈国連平和維持軍は ボスニアやルワンダで―〉 〈何百万もが死ぬのを ただ傍観してただけだ〉
〈何百万もが死ぬのを ただ傍観してただけだ〉

translation.en: You can't judge what you don't know.
Of course. Now you need a success story.
translation.ja: 〈その証として 成功例が必要なわけだな〉

translation.en: We've fought for our independence for 24 years
translation.ja: 〈我々は独立のために 24年間戦ってきた〉

translation.en: We're not going to be your experiment.
translation.ja: 〈実験台になるのは ゴメンだ〉
身に付けるのは年長者か―
尊敬される指導者だけだ

translation.en: I think I may be here longer than planned.
translation.ja: 予定より 長くいることになりそうだ
いつも焦(じ)らすことね

translation.en: And what else did your mother teach you?
To beware of wandering married men.
translation.ja: 結婚してる男に気をつけろ

translation.en: The most powerful official in UN history.
translation.ja: 国連史上 最高の権威だ

translation.en: what to do with all that power?
translation.ja: その権威で何ができるかだ
東ティモール 総督公邸 確かに

translation.en: You had it coming, you know.  Getting ripped a new asshole in front of everybody.
translation.ja: みんなの前で大恥かくのは 時間の問題だった

translation.en: If I was General Gusmao, you know what I'd think?
I'd think Sergio Vieira de Mello
translation.ja: デメロは革命軍を インドネシアに売り―

translation.en: is here to cut a deal with the Indonesians, sell out the rebels,
translation.ja: デメロは革命軍を インドネシアに売り― さっさと勝利の 宣告をすると思う
さっさと勝利の 宣告をすると思う

translation.en: And he was right to bring up Cambodia.
translation.ja: カンボジアの話は一理ある

translation.en: Still no justice for two million dead.

translation.ja: イエンは約束を守った

translation.en: - - I have family. Please don't shoot.
Stay together. Do as they say.
translation.ja: 一緒にいろ　離れるな

translation.en: All he has to do is nod his head and we're dead.
translation.ja: 彼がうなずけば殺される

translation.en: What the hell are you doing? Sergio?
- It's all right. It's okay. - What?
What the hell is going on?
The Sorbonne. Of course. Why not?

translation.ja: クメール･ルージュ イエン･サリ 指導者 君か…

translation.en: You declared the Sorbonne...  to be the people's university.
translation.ja: ソルボンヌを 庶民の大学だと唱えた

translation.en: And I still have a scar to prove it. Our...
translation.ja: その時の傷跡がまだ残ってる
僕らの革命は倒された

translation.en: or to embrace the armed struggle.
I don't believe in demanding the impossible anymore,
translation.ja: 不可能なことを 要求するのはやめたが―

translation.en: but I'm going to do the best I can to bring those refugees back home.
translation.ja: 難民が戻れるよう 精一杯努力する

translation.en: You know what? It still fascinates me.
Ieng and I... at a certain point of our lives... we were very similar.
translation.ja: イエンと… 考えが似ていた時期があった
本当だ 呆れかえるよ

translation.en: I have a title for your autobiography.
Well, I wish you'd listen to it sometimes.
translation.ja: なら少しは聞いてくれ

translation.en: This is Sergio de Mello. He has a meeting with General Gusmao.
translation.ja: デメロ氏はグスマン将軍と 会う約束がある

translation.en: No. We don't allow anyone to meet our leader today.
translation.ja: 将軍は今日 誰とも会わない

translation.en: He's the administrator of East Timor.
translation.ja: 彼は東ティモールの行政官だ

translation.en: No. We not allow anyone to meet our leader today.
translation.ja: 今日は誰とも会わない

translation.en: I have a meeting scheduled with General Gusmao for now.
translation.ja: 〈グスマン将軍と 会うはずなのだが〉

translation.en: Could you please tell him I'm here?
How do you spell your name?
He's a soldier... just following orders.
translation.ja: 命令に従うだけの兵隊だ

translation.en: - This is gonna take forever. - Yeah.
Gaby, I think I... I'm going to walk.
translation.ja: ギャビー 散歩してくるよ
わかった　探しに行く

translation.en: - I'll find you. - Just let me know if, uh...
translation.ja: わかった　探しに行く 彼が戻ったら…

translation.en: You chew and your mouth gets red.
I should ask you the same.
How will you win him over?
Well, I think he has to understand that I'm not his enemy.
translation.ja: 敵ではないと わかってもらいたい

translation.en: I have no idea how to do it.
Listen, I was just about to leave, but I think...
translation.ja: 帰るところだったけど…

translation.en: I think I have to show you something, if you have time.
translation.ja: 時間があるなら 見せたいものがある

translation.en: You know, sometimes change starts small.
translation.ja: 変化は 草の根レベルから始まる

translation.en: This is the Bobometo Collective, our pilot project.
translation.ja: これは私達が ボボメトで行っている事業よ

translation.en: We give these women start- up loans.
translation.ja: この女性達に融資する

translation.en: They do the rest. People want to work. They want dignity.
translation.ja: 人は働いて 人間としての価値を感じたい

translation.en: And so finally they can earn a living by doing what they've done for centuries.
translation.ja: これで彼女達は― 何百年もしてきたことで 生計を立てられる

translation.en: This project really shows the power of microfinance.
translation.ja: マイクロファイナンスの力を 発揮できる

translation.en: many more like this one around the country.
translation.ja: このような仕事場を作りたい
彼女はセニョリーニャ

translation.en: She lost everything, including two sons, killed by the militia.
translation.ja: 民兵に２人の息子を殺され すべて失った

translation.en: I think you'd like to talk to her.

translation.ja: 〈ティモールの統治を 頼まれた〉

translation.en: We have been waiting for the future to arrive.
translation.ja: 〈未来が来るのを 待っている〉

translation.en: What do you want most for your future?
translation.ja: 〈どんな未来を 望んでいるの？〉

translation.en: If I tell you what I want...
I don't think you would understand.
Really? I can make an effort to try.
translation.ja: 〈そうかな わかるように努力するよ〉

translation.en: I want to go up into the sky...
to the place where I was born.
on my soil, on my land.
I completely understand what you want.
So, tell the world to see us
We want to be seen. All of us.
translation.ja: 〈私達はみんな 世界に見てもらいたい〉

translation.en: - Can I give you a hug? -
How beautiful what you just told me.
- I love this rain. - It rains every day at the same time?
translation.ja: 雨は大好き 毎日同じ時間に降る

translation.en: I have a message from General Gusmao.
- I'll wait in the car. - Yeah.
He wants the president of Indonesia to apologize. For 24 years of war.
translation.ja: インドネシアの大統領に 24年間の侵害をわびろだと

translation.en: he wants full independence for East Timor.
translation.ja: 東ティモールの完全独立を 求めている

translation.en: - Here! Right now! - I got it!
There you go. Sit right here. There you go. Easy, easy, easy.
translation.ja: ここに座っていてくれ

translation.en: There you go, there you go.
Okay? Hold that right there. That's it. There you go.
- Hey! - You need any help down there?
Hell, yes. Have you got any experience?

translation.ja: ＮＹ(ニューヨーク)の消防士だ

translation.en: - Well, get down here, buddy. - I'm coming, brother.
translation.ja: 下りてきてくれ 了解　今行く
了解　今行く 助けが来る

translation.en: - All right. I'm Andre. - I'm Bill. Boy, am I glad to see you.
translation.ja: 俺はアンドレ ビルだ　よく来てくれた
生存者２人共 意識がある

translation.en: This is Gil. He's lucid. BP, 100/60.
translation.ja: 生存者２人共 意識がある ギルの血圧は100/60

translation.en: Beneath him, Sergio. Also lucid. BP 90/60.
translation.ja: 彼の下にいるセルジオは 血圧90/60

translation.en: Both pinned from the hips down.
I used my only IV on Gil.
translation.ja: 静脈注射はギルに与えた

translation.en: We need to extract him first.
- That doesn't sound good. - My comms are down.
translation.ja: 弱ったな 通信が途絶えた まったく反応がない

translation.en: I'm calling. I'm getting zero response.
translation.ja: 通信が途絶えた まったく反応がない

translation.en: Army Corps of Engineers,  they've got the equipment we need at Baghdad Airport.
translation.ja: 陸軍工兵隊の機材が 空港にある

translation.en: Use my call signal, Nomad Two.
translation.ja: コールサインはノマドツー

translation.en: You call my guys, and they can get it done.
translation.ja: 本部に連絡して 運んでもらおう

translation.en: Nomad Base, this is Nomad Two.
translation.ja: ノマドツーから本部へ

translation.en: Nomad Two, this is Nomad Base. Go ahead.
You've always managed to defy the odds.
translation.ja: 君は逆境をものともしない

translation.en: - So far. - We need an extraction team
- I need you to give me a hand. - Get him up.
translation.ja: 手を貸してくれ 彼を起こせ

translation.en: Copy that. We'll start looking for the gear now.
- Come right here, miss. - You should go.
translation.ja: こちらへどうぞ 行きなさい

translation.en: We're going to get you up and in the truck right here.
Sit in the back of the truck.
Okay? Sit in the truck. You're in the back.
- You're good. - You are going home.
translation.ja: よし 家に帰れるわよ

translation.en: Hey. Gaby, we need water. We need IV solutions.
translation.ja: ギャビー 水と 静脈注射の溶液がいる

translation.en: We're also waiting on our heavy equipment.
- Yes. - We're running out of time.
Can you light a fire under somebody's ass?
Everyone is good, Sergio. Everyone is good.
- You don't need to do this now. - I've got it, Gil.
translation.ja: そんなバカな これでいい
決めたことだ 待ってくれ 地球の反対側まで来て…

translation.en: I did not come halfway around the world to take orders from--
translation.ja: 待ってくれ 地球の反対側まで来て…

translation.en: From a Timorese rebel with a high school education.
translation.ja: 高卒の革命家に 指図されたくない

translation.en: We were sent here to run East Timor.
translation.ja: 我々は東ティモールの 行政官だ

translation.en: - We were sent here to run... - We know what we're doing.

translation.ja: 一時的な措置にすぎない

translation.en: Oh, I see. So we all give up power to the Timorese, except for you.
translation.ja: 君以外は全員権限を ティモール人に渡すのか？

translation.en: - Is that it? - If you don't like it...
- I don't like it. - ...you're free to go.
- You're free to go. Then go. - I don't like it.
We were sent here as overlords.
translation.ja: 統治者としてここに送られた

translation.en: But I really hope... we can leave as respected colleagues.
translation.ja: だが尊敬される 同僚として去りたい

translation.en: From now on,  we take our orders directly from you.
translation.ja: これからは 君達から直接指示を仰ぐ

translation.en: Because what we are about to do here... is really important.
translation.ja: 我々は非常に大事なことを しようとしている

translation.en: We are about to build the first new nation of the 21st century.
translation.ja: 21世紀初の 新しい国家を設立する

translation.en: Stand up. Come here. Come closer.
Gil, why don't you introduce yourself?
translation.ja: ギル 君から始めてくれ

translation.en: My name is Gil Loescher and, um... I work for the UN.
translation.ja: ギル･ロッシャーだ 国連で働いている

translation.en: His life is the pursuit of a pursuit forever.
It is the future that creates his present.
All is an interminable chain of longing.
translation.ja: “すべては 果てしない切望の連続”

translation.en: This goes perfectly... with ovos Mexidos.
translation.ja: これはどんな 卵料理にでも合う

translation.en: Your boys, how old are they?
And the other one is 19 now.
And how often do you see them?
Shrimp moqueca with red palm oil.
translation.ja: 〈赤パーム油で煮込んだ エビのムケッカ〉

translation.en: So good to see you here with the kids.
translation.ja: 〈子供達も一緒で うれしいわ〉
40万人のカンボジア難民が 帰り始めています
40万人のカンボジア難民が 帰り始めています 40万人のカンボジア難民が 帰り始めています 〝カンボジアで 国連が難民を帰還〞

translation.en: part of a peace deal with the notorious Khmer Rouge that no one thought possible.
translation.ja: 〝カンボジアで 国連が難民を帰還〞 国連がクメール･ルージュと 奇跡の平和協定を結びました 国連がクメール･ルージュと 奇跡の平和協定を結びました

translation.en: - Speak English with your grandma. - I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 英語で話しなさい ゴメン

translation.en: Don't be sorry. It's not your fault if your daddy didn't teach you Portuguese.
translation.ja: 父親がポルトガル語を 教えなかったのが悪い

translation.en: Nor that your grandma, the wife of a diplomat,
translation.ja: 外交官の妻である祖母が― フランス語を 話せないのが悪い
フランス語を 話せないのが悪い

translation.en: Look at the size of this shrimp.
This is from Lurdes' hometown, Salvador.
translation.ja: ルーデスの故郷 サルバドルの料理

translation.en: It's called moqueca, and it's probably the best Brazilian food
translation.ja: ムケッカと言って ブラジルで最高の料理だ

translation.en: I'm just not very hungry right now.
translation.ja: あまりお腹空いてない

translation.en: and we decided to give the boys a stable home...
translation.ja: 安定した環境が良かれと…
子供達を母親と ジュネーブに住ませた

translation.en: My work is in the field.
When I'm on a mission, I...
I know what part I am to play...
translation.ja: 送られる時は 期間が決まっている

translation.en: in order to get the job done within a certain time frame.
translation.ja: 何をすれば仕事が片付くか わかっている

translation.en: I think I'm not very good at... indefinite assignments.
translation.ja: 期限がない任務は 得意じゃない

translation.en: We are about to indulge ourselves.
translation.ja: お互いを思う存分 満喫する

translation.en: I have a song for you.
- You can't get in. - Come on. Let me in.
translation.ja: 立入禁止だ 通して！

translation.en: I need to get in! I need to get in!
Under no circumstances should any Muslim
translation.ja: 〈イスラム教徒及び 正気の者は―〉

translation.en: or sane person resort to the United Nations.
translation.ja: 〈断じて国連に 屈してはならない〉

translation.en: The UN is nothing but a tool of crime.
translation.ja: 〈国連は 犯罪の道具にすぎない〉

translation.en: We are being massacred every day, while the United Nations sits idly by.
translation.ja: 〈我々が毎日虐殺されるのを 傍観するだけだ〉

translation.en: - I'm sure I don't need to tell you this-- - But you're going to anyway.
translation.ja: 承知だと思うが… 言うんだろ

translation.en: We are reaching out to the same government that was slaughtering the Timorese for decades.
translation.ja: この政府は何十年も ティモール人を抹殺してきた

translation.en: Are you sure you're all right?
I want to fall from the sky... like rain...
translation.ja: 僕は空から 雨のように降って…

translation.en: and remain forever... in the place where I belong.
translation.ja: 然るべき場所で 永遠に暮らしたい

translation.en: What the fuck did you just say?
translation.ja: 今のはさっぱり解せない
どうぞ インドネシア大統領 グス･ドゥル
東ティモールは国民投票で―

translation.en: because the people of East Timor, in a plebiscite,
translation.ja: 東ティモールは国民投票で― 独立国家になることを 決めました
独立国家になることを 決めました

translation.en: That's how they want to be seen... by the rest of the world.
translation.ja: 世界からそう見られることを 望んでいます

translation.en: And for the 24 years of Indonesian domination,
translation.ja: そしてインドネシアの 24年に渡る支配の間に―

translation.en: I'm sorry to deny you a diplomatic breakthrough,
translation.ja: 君には悪いが外交交渉は―

translation.en: but the world is not that simple.
The age of occupation is over, Mr. President.
translation.ja: 他国を占領する時代は もう終わりです

translation.en: They just want to be... acknowledged as what they are.
translation.ja: 彼らはありのままの自分達を 認めてもらいたいだけです

translation.en: Because the way you look at them...
translation.ja: あなたが彼らを見るのと…

translation.en: will determine the way the whole world will look at you.
translation.ja: 同じ目で 世界はあなたを見ます

translation.en: It's been abandoned since the Civil War.
translation.ja: 国内戦争以来 放棄された建物だ

translation.en: and they were hoping to find the Spice Islands.
translation.ja: 香料諸島を探していたんだ
オランダ ポルトガル

translation.en: So the Indonesians are going to apologize?
translation.ja: インドネシアは謝罪するの？

translation.en: You don't have to do that.
The mission is almost over, isn't it?
translation.ja: 任務はもう終わりでしょ

translation.en: I know what I want for my life, Sergio.
translation.ja: 私は欲しいものがある

translation.en: I'm not going to wait for you to decide what you want for yours.
translation.ja: あなたが決めるのを 待ってられない

translation.en: My guys called the base commander.
Any other city in the world  and these guys are evac'd by now, you know that.
translation.ja: 他の都市なら とっくに救出されている

translation.en: There's nothing else coming... is there?
translation.ja: 助けは来そうにないな

translation.en: It doesn't look that way, no.
It doesn't look very welcoming... does it?
translation.ja: 歓迎されてないようだ

translation.en: This is Baghdad, Sergio, not Saint- Tropez.
Yes, sir. All right, on me!
- Who wants us out? - The UN guy.
translation.ja: 誰が？ 国連が 占領軍の一部だと 思われたくないそうだ

translation.en: He says he doesn't want the locals to think the UN is part of the occupation.
translation.ja: 国連が 占領軍の一部だと 思われたくないそうだ

translation.en: We wouldn't want that, would we?
The most powerful army on earth...
and this is the best you can do?
The best they could do was to put tanks guarding our headquarters.
translation.ja: 本部を戦車で 守ることはできた

translation.en: - What the fuck were you thinking? - What the fuck are you talking about?
translation.ja: 何を考えていたんだ？ 何のことだ？

translation.en: The moment we got to Baghdad, you put all our lives at risk.
translation.ja: バグダッドに来て 全員の命を危険にさらした

translation.en: Which is more than you ever do.
- Fuck you. - Everybody try to stay positive, okay?
translation.ja: クソ野郎 前向きでいよう

translation.en: We'll try to stay positive as you fill your purse with rocks.
translation.ja: 前向きにどこへ行くんだ？

translation.en: Sergio, did you really just tell the guards to leave?
translation.ja: セルジオ 警備を追い払ったの？

translation.en: We need to assess the security situation.
translation.ja: 〈治安を 見定めるべきでは？〉

translation.en: Qabush, can you please close the door?
We have no choice but to work with the Americans.
translation.ja: アメリカと協力するのは やむを得ない

translation.en: But we cannot hide behind their wall of armor.
translation.ja: だが 弾薬を 隠れみのにできない

translation.en: more clear to me than ever why we're here...
translation.ja: 今はっきりとわかった

translation.en: and why I asked you, my colleagues, my friends, to join me on this mission
translation.ja: 君達を同僚として呼んだ訳も

translation.en: and why this mission requires the very best... of the United Nations diplomatic corps.
translation.ja: なぜこの任務に一番優秀な 国連外交団が必要なのかも

translation.en: We are not here to fix Iraq...
translation.ja: 来たのは イラクを直すためでも…

translation.en: or to tell its people what to do.
translation.ja: 指図するためでもない

translation.en: We have to face the Iraqi people openly.
translation.ja: イラクの人々に向き合うんだ

translation.en: Openly as ourselves, as the United Nations because this is who we are.
translation.ja: 国連の人間として 心を開くんだ

translation.en: And this is what we do best.
All right. Do you have our election templates?
translation.ja: 選挙のお手本はそろってる？

translation.en: From Timor and Kosovo. We're ready.
translation.ja: ティモールとコソボから
憲兵隊の者です 大尉だ

translation.en: I just want to let you know we found Sergio inside.
translation.ja: セルジオが中にいます

translation.en: - Is he alive? - He's alive, sir.
Let's get him out. Get him out.
How big of an explosion, in other words, was this?
translation.ja: どれほど大きな 爆発でした？

translation.en: Well, the UN building in the Canal Hotel is quite separate from other buildings.
translation.ja: カナル･ホテルは 他の建物と離れています

translation.en: - Mr. Marshall-- - It has a few--
translation.ja: ちょっと待ってください

translation.en: Hold on one second because Paul Bremer,
translation.ja: ちょっと待ってください アメリカ行政官の ブレマー氏の話を―

translation.en: the Chief US Administrator in Iraq, is speaking right now,
translation.ja: アメリカ行政官の ブレマー氏の話を―

translation.en: and I want our viewers to hear what he has to say.
translation.ja: 視聴者に聞いて頂きたい

translation.en: As of this time, my dear friend Sergio... is, uh, somewhere...
translation.ja: 親友のセルジオは 今現在どこかに埋もれている

translation.en: back there. We're doing everything we can to get him out.
translation.ja: 救出するべく 全力を尽くしている

translation.en: He may well have been the target of this attack
translation.ja: 標的は彼だったかもしれない

translation.en: which will only strengthen our resolve to fight terror... wherever we find it.
translation.ja: より一層厳しくテロに 対処せねばならない

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you very much.
As soon as we know anything, uh, we'll let you know.
translation.ja: 何かわかり次第報せる

translation.en: - Are you okay? - It's getting harder to breathe.
translation.ja: 息が苦しくなってきた

translation.en: I need you to understand something.
What we need to do... to get you out of here...
translation.ja: 君をここから出すためには…

translation.en: We're going to have to amputate both your legs, Gil.
translation.ja: 両足を切断する必要がある

translation.en: I've already given you the maximum dose of morphine. Any more and it'd kill you.
translation.ja: これ以上のモルヒネは 致死量を超える

translation.en: You do whatever it takes to get us out.
Get me back to my family.
We'll get you out of here.
- - We'll get you out of here.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
- Can you just wait for a minute? - Yes.
- Of course. Sure. - A minute. Thank you.
So, you say you have some papers for me?
All is an interminable chain of longing.
translation.ja: “すべては 果てしない切望の連続”

translation.en: can you tell me right now...
right now, what do you want?
where an outcropping of rocks meets the sea at...
translation.ja: 露出した岩が 海とぶつかる場所が…
アルポアドールと言う

translation.en: This is a place where my father...
used to take me  when I was a child.
translation.ja: 父がよく連れて行ってくれた

translation.en: still today I return the moment I arrive in Rio.
translation.ja: リオに戻ると真っ先に行く

translation.en: I want to go back home.
I want to go back to Brazil.
I want to stop... being what people expect me to be.
translation.ja: 人の期待に応えるために 生きるのをやめたい

translation.en: it's not an easy thing for me to do.
translation.ja: 僕には簡単じゃないんだ

translation.en: - You should go and do that. - Wait.
translation.ja: そうしたらいい 待って

translation.en: I want to see this country independent... and free.
translation.ja: この国が独立国として 自由になるのを見届けたい

translation.en: You'd better be fucking sure 'cause I want you too.
translation.ja: 本気じゃなかったら 許さないわよ

translation.en: There you go. All right, buddy.
Y'all get ready to send them home.
Okay, they're going back in. Get the stretcher ready.
translation.ja: 中に戻る　担架の用意を

translation.en: - You need to leave the area now. - I won't leave!
translation.ja: この場を離れろ どこにも行かない

translation.en: - You can't get through. - I can't! I can't!
- I need to make it there, you understand? - Listen--
translation.ja: どうしても 行かなきゃいけないの

translation.en: - I need to go. - You can't be here.
translation.ja: どうしても 行かなきゃいけないの ダメだ

translation.en: - Listen to me! Why are you stopping me? - You have to go.
- It is too dangerous. - Why? I need to find him.
I need to be with my Sergio. Do you hear me?
translation.ja: セルジオのそばに行く

translation.en: - Sergio de Mello? - Yes! I need to go.
- Gaby! - Viens ici. He's here. Sergio's here.
translation.ja: ギャビー セルジオはここ

translation.en: - Up here. - Can you show me?
- But you can talk to him. -
Sergio, my love, are you there?
Sergio, my love, I am here!
Do you remember that night in East Timor?
translation.ja: 東ティモールが独立した…

translation.en: Listen, there are at least three official parties tonight.
translation.ja: 正式なパーティーが ３つはあるわ

translation.en: Bill Clinton wants you at his, so does Kofi.
translation.ja: ビル･クリントンに 呼ばれてる

translation.en: We're not going to any of those.
I know what I want to do tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜したいことがある

translation.en: Ma'am, we need you to clear the area.
translation.ja: ここから離れてください

translation.en: Ma'am, we're bringing the heavy equipment in.
- We need you out of there. -
- I'm bringing the heavy equipment in. - I'm not leaving.
- I'm not leaving. - You need to get out now.
Carolina, let's go now. Let's go. It's better.
translation.ja: カロリーナ 離れた方がいい
軍事衝突の危機にある

translation.en: An Iraqi regime faced with its own demise
translation.ja: ニューヨークシティー 崩壊寸前のイラク政権は 残虐行為に走る可能性がある

translation.en: may attempt cruel and desperate measures.
translation.ja: ニューヨークシティー 崩壊寸前のイラク政権は 残虐行為に走る可能性がある 崩壊寸前のイラク政権は 残虐行為に走る可能性がある

translation.en: UN Envoy Sergio de Mello was in the Oval Office today,
translation.ja: デメロ氏は本日 大統領執務室を訪れ…

translation.en: urging President Bush to work through the Security Council
translation.ja: ありがとう 元気かい？
国際法に従うことを主張

translation.en: You ask questions or do you want to hear from me?

translation.ja: 今…　ブッシュ大統領は―

translation.en: I just met President Bush, and he explained
translation.ja: 今…　ブッシュ大統領は― アメリカの姿勢を明確にした

translation.en: the position of the United States.
translation.ja: アメリカの姿勢を明確にした

translation.en: - And I reminded him-- - Sir, your table is ready.
translation.ja: 戦争による… テーブルへ

translation.en: Thank you. Bye- bye. Bye, Sergio. ...what the human cost of a war...
translation.ja: 人的被害は想像に及ばない…

translation.en: Bush is going to want you in Iraq.
translation.ja: イラクに行かせる魂胆ね

translation.en: He didn't formally ask but it's coming.
translation.ja: 正式な要請はまだだが

translation.en: What are you going to do?
We are going to Rio, that's for sure.
translation.ja: リオに行くのは確かだ

translation.en: If I go,  it's going to be four months.
And...  I'm only going if you're going.
translation.ja: 君が行かなければ行かない

translation.en: Sergio, it's an illegal war against everything you believe in.
translation.ja: 〈戦争は違法よ あなたの信条に反する〉

translation.en: The war is happening, what I believe doesn't matter.
translation.ja: 〈何を信じようと 戦争は起きる〉

translation.en: I'm just saying it doesn't have to be you.
translation.ja: あなたでなくてもいい

translation.en: Bush will definitely owe you one.
translation.ja: ブッシュに貸しを作る気ね

translation.en: And Kofi's term is almost up.
translation.ja: コフィーの任期も終わる…

translation.en: - Is that what-- - You know me.
translation.ja: コフィーの任期も終わる… そんなことは考えてない
そんなことは考えてない

translation.en: After Iraq, we are going to Rio.
translation.ja: イラクの後 リオに行く

translation.en: Soon I'll be leaving the UN,
The boys can come visit us.
Your sons are not children anymore.
My mom will love meeting you.

translation.ja: 〈母も狂ってるから きっと気が合う〉

translation.en: Or you can just say no... to everybody.
translation.ja: 断ってしまえばいいのよ
コフィーもブッシュもみんな

translation.en: - You wanna know how it's done? - Yeah. You wanna know?
translation.ja: どうすればいいか知りたい？

translation.en: Back home, I'm a fire chief.
I run into burning buildings. What's not to like?
translation.ja: 燃える建物に飛び込めて 最高だよ

translation.en: Today, we share our shock and sorrow
translation.ja: 愛する人々を失った 衝撃と悲しみを―

translation.en: at the loss of people we loved.
translation.ja: 国連事務総長 コフィー･アナン 分かち合わせていただきます
レイド リン イフサン
クリストファー マーサ フィオナ

translation.en: Even to those  who didn't know you personally,
translation.ja: 個人的に知らない人にまで―
“セルジオ”と 親しまれていた

translation.en: Never forget the real challenges and the real rewards
translation.ja: 国連に務める 真のやりがいと報いは―

translation.en: of serving the United Nations are out there in the field...
translation.ja: 現場にあることを 忘れないでほしい

translation.en: where people are suffering,  where people need you.
translation.ja: 君を必要とするのは 窮地に立つ人々だ

translation.en: and here we are to help you in any way we can.
translation.ja: いつでも君たちの助けになる
